title: Data Upload
text: Create new script called something along lines create_context. script include connect data using Rochedata package. (Please note methods , however one one easiest). step must create data object. must source Teal4Real_userdata.R file like : source(“create_context.R”). example, please replace ARD Schema name (one) call edm object name choice.
code: ard_schema_name_edm <- "flatiron_edm_ansclc_ard_2023_11"  schema_name_edm <- "flatiron_edm_ansclc_sdm_2023_11"  #Replace with own Schema name  edm <- RocheData::get_data(data = "flatiron_edm_ansclc") #Assigning the data to Object called edm #> → Connecting to MDHmeta API and saving to session cache... #> → Getting MDH datasets info... #> ✔ Done. #> ✔ MDHmeta connections saved in the session cache. #> → Reading connections from the package config file... #> ✔ Done. edm$connect() #> Connecting to the database: 'flatiron_edm_ansclc'...

code: get_broad_cohort <- function(db_obj, schema_name, ard_schema_name, use_reporteddate = T)        create_tbl <- function(database_schema, table_name, .db, ...) {         tbl(.db, in_schema(database_schema, table_name))       }

title: Data Upload
text: optional step however may help separate whole data process app logic. may substantially improve run time app. First create markdown file inst folder. serve scheduled report uploading data pin Posit Connect. Put files functions used create cohort data inst folder source files markdown file. markdown file: call following librarys magrittr pins, source “create_context.R” “create_cohorts.R” files. Also call main data function, connect board save output pin. example markdown file look like (Impower_data pin name): example separate pin data data date (extracted schema). Now Teal4Real_userdata.R file add syntax code pull data pin. schedule report automatically need deploy report Posit Connect source code schedule custom way. may want custom Use blue button top right deploy r markdown. Follow steps ensure markdown source code.  First time, may crash. important still deploy even crashes. reaosn usually due needing input environment variables. deployed,Posit Connect directly, see Vars feature can input username password. also find Schedule feature can schedule often want markdown knit background, carry step. (chosen daily). Please note, making changes cohort, important knit markdown run app, changes made.
